page.description: Formats a date value using a user defined format string
page.prototype: Formatted_Date_Time_String as C = date_format(D date ,C format)

argument.name: date
argument.description: A representation of a date that satisfies the ISDATE()function.

argument.name: format
argument.description: The date format defined using date format elements. See [Date and Time Format Elements] for more information about defining a format.

page.discussion: DATE_FORMAT() returns a formatted character string representation of the Date_Value.
page.example: dim dateString as C dateString = date_format(DATE() , "MON, d-yyyy") ? dateString = "JAN, 11-2018"
